summary: Project to display user feedback from activities 1 and 2 on a leadership board in real time, without requiring a page refresh.
architectural_notes: Leadership board should update in real time when activity 1 or 2 feedback is submitted (no manual refresh).

existing_features.title: Make the Leadership Board update automatically while the page is open so new Activity 1 (leadership word) and Activity 2 (micro-solution) submissions appear without the user manually refreshing the browser.

After a successful Activity 1 submission, update the cached Leadership Word counts immediately so any mounted Leadership Board/summary views reflect the new word count right away (in the same SPA session), without waiting for the next refetch.

After a successful Activity 2 submission, update the cached Community Solutions list immediately so any mounted Leadership Board/solutions views reflect the new micro-solution right away (in the same SPA session), without waiting for the next refetch.

new_feature_requests.summary: Post feedback from activities 1 and 2 to the leadership board immediately as it is given to the user (no page refresh required).

projectName: Show Activity 1 & 2 feedback on Leadership Board immediately (no manual refresh)
